title: Dia logos and Narrative w/ Paul Vanderklay, and Mary Kochan - Part 1
description:
Mary, Paul, and I enter into a rich and rewarding dia logos about narrative and dialogue, and dia logos. I found this to be a conversation that really helped to clarify some of these central issues.

Paul's channel: https://www.youtube.com/user/paulvanderklay
Mary's channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC2leFZRD0ZlQDQxpR2Zd8oA
